mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info (user_id, space_id, file_name, original_name, file_path, content_type, file_size, category, sub_category, status, download_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{spaceId}, #{fileName}, #{originalName}, #{filePath}, #{contentType}, #{fileSize}, #{category}, #{subCategory}, #{status}, #{downloadCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM file_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM file_info WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM file_info WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE file_info SET user_id = #{userId}, space_id = #{spaceId}, file_name = #{fileName}, original_name = #{originalName}, file_path = #{filePath}, content_type = #{contentType}, file_size = #{fileSize}, category = #{category}, sub_category = #{subCategory}, status = #{status}, download_count = #{downloadCount}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE file_info SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE file_info SET download_count = download_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
